price: Ɔkaa sε: “Wͻnam manamͻn so di m’akyi, na me Wura Nyankopͻn, meyεε ntεm baa Wo hͻ sεdeε wobεgye me ato mu”.
arabic: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla hum ulāi ʿalā atharī waʿajil'tu ilayka rabbi litarḍā
